Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Hawks to win based on their recent performance.
Trae Young has been performing exceptionally well without Dejounte Murray, averaging 5.2 rebounds and 11.7 assists per game.
Jordan Hawkins is expected to have a breakout season due to increased offensive responsibility and favorable matchup against Atlanta's defense.
The Pelicans are 18-3 when making 15 or more three-pointers last season, ranking best in the NBA, while the Hawks allowed 14.0 made threes per game, ranking 4th worst in the NBA.
